Html:
Thanks for your product.
I'm trying to use ShowMessageAction but an error happened when an Instance was created.
When will "v2" becomes available? And before that, how can I show a message at a specified time?
Thank you.

ShowMessageAction has been working for many years and will display a message to the user at a specified time. The OS must be Vista or later. There is an example within the Documentation section that shows how to use it.

But when I use it, an error occurs like this image:

I'm using windows 8 and Execaction works perfectly.
Please help me. Thank you.
This could mean that you have an invalid character used in the message.

This is my code:
ts.AddTask(@"HomeBot\Task0", new TimeTrigger(DateTime.Now.AddMilliseconds(15)), new ShowMessageAction("gdgd","Gdgd"));
Help me.

Make sure than when you instantiate the TaskService object, you are not specifying "true" for the forceV1 parameter in the constructor or setting the HighestSupportedVersion property to something lower than or equal to 1.1.

I'm sure about that.
Cause I just use Default Contructor of TaskService.
And no code change the the HighestSupportedVersion property.
When I show this property, It's 1.4
